H0.text: Hydrogen Peroxide (H2O2) is one of several different forms of what commonly named chemical agent. Bleach

H1.text: Hydrogen Peroxide (H2O2) is one of several different forms of what commonly named chemical agent. Oxidizer

H2.text: Hydrogen Peroxide (H2O2) is one of several different forms of what commonly named chemical agent. Disinfectant

H3.text: Hydrogen Peroxide (H2O2) is one of several different forms of what commonly named chemical agent. Javex

A4.text: Hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) is used, for example, to bleach wood pulp, hair and teeth, or to prepare other bleaching agents such as perborates, percarbonates, peracids, etc.

A5.text: Hydrogen peroxide is used for sterilization purposes and water treatment.
